# uptimekuma_notification_linenotify (Resource)

LINE Notify notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_linenotify" "example" {
  name         = "LINE Notify Alert"
  is_active    = true
  access_token = "YOUR_LINE_NOTIFY_ACCESS_TOKEN"

  # Optional fields
  is_default     = false
  apply_existing = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive) LINE Notify access token for authentication
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
